description: As a user I want to verify that Calendar navigation in Events screen

elements.name: Navigate to next weeks and return to today

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user clicks the 'next' button more than '1' times
The calendar should display the correct 'next' month 1 with format "MMMM YYYY"

elements.name: Navigate to next weeks and return to today

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user clicks the 'prev' button more than '1' times
The calendar should display the correct 'prev' month 1 with format "MMMM YYYY"

elements.name: Navigate to next weeks and return to today

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user clicks the 'next' button more than '3' times
clicks the "today" button
The calendar should display the correct 'next' month 0 with format "MMMM YYYY"

elements.name: Navigate to next weeks and return to today

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
clicks the 'week' button
The calendar should display the correct 'week' month 0 with format 'MMM D'

elements.name: Navigate to next weeks and return to today

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
clicks the 'day' button
The calendar should display the correct 'day' month 0 with format 'MMMM D, YYYY'

elements.name: Navigate to next weeks and return to today

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
clicks the 'month' button
The calendar should display the correct 'month' month 0 with format 'MMMM YYYY'

elements.name: User adds a new event on the last day of the current month

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user selects the last day of the current month
The Add Event modal should be "Add event" title displayed
Enters event information with 'Test Event TCS-03','2025-06-30','Test Description','7:00 AM','2025-06-30','9:00 PM','212 Hai Chau, Da Nang','','OpenAI','Only me'
clicks the " Save" button
The event should be added successfully with 'Test Event TCS-03','2025-06-30','Test Description','7:00 AM','2025-06-30','9:00 PM','212 Hai Chau, Da Nang','','OpenAI','Only me'

elements.name: User input on the required field

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user clicks the Add Event button
The Add Event modal should be "Add event" title displayed
clicks the " Save" button
The validation error message should be displayed for the "This field is required." field

elements.name: Add new event successfully with required field

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user clicks the Add Event button
Enters event information with required field 'Test Event TCS-05A','2025-06-20'
clicks the " Save" button
The event should be added successfully with 'Test Event TCS-05A','2025-06-20'

elements.name: Add new event successfully with all field

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user clicks the Add Event button
Enters event information with 'Test Event TCS-05B','2025-06-25','Test Description','7:00 AM','2025-06-30','9:00 PM','212 Hai Chau, Da Nang','','OpenAI','Only me'
clicks the " Save" button
The event should be added successfully with 'Test Event TCS-05B','2025-06-25','Test Description','7:00 AM','2025-06-30','9:00 PM','212 Hai Chau, Da Nang','','OpenAI','Only me'

elements.name: Add Event modal cannot be closed by clicking outside

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user selects the current day of the current month
The Add Event modal should be "Add event" title displayed
The user clicks outside the Add Event modal
The Add Event modal should be "Add event" title displayed

elements.name: Add Event modal should close when clicking the Close button

steps.name: Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user selects the current day of the current month
The Add Event modal should be "Add event" title displayed
The user clicks the Close button on the modal
The Add Event modal should be "Add event" title undisplayed
Open browser and navigate to the login page
The user enter the username "admin@example.com" and password "123456"
The user click the login button
The user should be logged in and redirected to the dashboard successfully
The user navigates to the "Events" screen
The user clicks the Add Event button
Enters event information with required field 'Test Event TCS-08','2025-06-22'
clicks the " Save" button
The event should be added successfully with 'Test Event TCS-08','2025-06-22'
The user deletes the event
The event titled '2025-06-22' should no longer be visible
A yellow success message 'The event has been deleted.' should be displayed

name: Event
